Posts.Content: Jun 22, 2016 04:51PM AngryBird wrote: Been over a year for my surgery. Lumpectomy and lymph node. No radiation and no chemo. Still in pain. Still freak out if even my pinkie hurts. I use as many organic anything that I can...a great herb I've been taking for my nerves is L-theanine. Works like a charm...no side effects. God bless all you ladies. I feel like my ordeal is minor compared to some of you.
Posts.Title: Pain in lumpectomy site years later Rachel1 mom2bunky
